Room.Name: Oceanview Drive/Golden Dolphin Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Golden Dolphin Way and Oceanview Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Oceanview Drive meets Golden Dolphin Way at this intersection. South of the intersection is the massive City Wall which protects the citizens of Oceancrest from the ever-present threat of attack by orcs, pirates and other unfriendly enemies. Golden Dolphin Way runs east to west along the side of the City Wall.
